wikipedia_page.main:
Lee Dair (born 28 May 1977), is a Scottish former professional footballer. He has played in the Scottish Football League First Division for Raith Rovers.
Dair is currently the assistand manager of East of Scotland team Dundonald Bluebell.

response: The current manager is Kevin Fotheringham and the assistant manager is Lee Dair, whose brother Jason resigned as manager to become a first team coach at Dunfermline Athletic.
